import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Layout, Main } from "../../../components"; import { api } from "../../../utils" export const Add = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(); const [lastName, setLastName] = useState(); const [email, setEmail] = useState(); const [city, setCity] = useState(); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(); const handleOnSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); api.post("/tareas.json", { name: name, lastName: lastName, email: email, city: city, phone: phone }); }; return (
